DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study learn effect gamma-hydroxybutyric acid compare physiological , behavioral subjective effect several drug . This trial conduct double-blind , double-dummy , placebo-controlled , counter-balanced ( Latin-square design ) crossover study volunteer history sedative abuse . Volunteers recruit advertise word-of-mouth . Volunteers reside residential research unit duration study participate maximum 16 experimental session . Sessions conduct five day week ( Monday Friday ) . The primary subjective behavioral measure take drug administration 0.5 , 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 12 24 hour drug administration .
